description: This Italian Restaurant offers classic dishes like lasagna and tagliata di manzo. They use fresh ingredients to create creamy risottos and flavorful entrees.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, the main courses showcase the best of Italian cuisine.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A photo of lasagna, a traditional baked pasta dish with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A photo of tagliata di manzo, sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan, at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A photo of risotto ai funghi, creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.
